description: This is a template for exalted literature (hard cover).

Breen Exalted Media was a highly praised publisher providing exalted philosophical literature about the higher meaning of life itself.  These books offer insights in the deepest depths of our soul and always deliver uplifting "turgidity".
A messianic entity from the future travels to modern-day earth to wipe out 300,000,000 "bad people" and usher in a new era of peace.
Identical twin brothers become hybrid artificial intelligence entities, yet torn in different directions to achieve justice for humanity.
A computer-scientist/novelist reunites with his childhood friend, hacks into government databases, and faces the dire and fateful consequences of the mystical actions he obtained as a child.

name.str_pl: copies of I Am Here... Now

description: Disappointed by its creation, the almighty being that created Man arrives on Earth in a human form and interacts with various troubled, wicked and sinful people on his journey to Vegas.
A brilliant computer loner seizes Las Vegas and its terrorist attack, while fighting against his fits of clinical depression and obsession for romance and death.
